description: This dataset contains a list of all active permits issued by the State Liquor Authority.  Permits in this dataset are issued for 1-3 year terms.  This dataset does not include temporary or single event.

metadata.description: This dataset contains a list of all active permits issued by the State Liquor Authority.  Permits in this dataset are issued for 1-3 year terms.  This dataset does not include temporary or single event.

name: Liquor Authority Quarterly List of Active Permits
